message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $11,500. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within $12,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns. While $10,000 is lower than I hoped for, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,750? This would allow me to recoup a fair value for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose $10,500 for the product.
